titleStmt.title: A coal from the altar, to kindle the holy fire of zeale In a sermon preached at a generall visitation at Ipswich. By Samuell Ward, Bach. of Diuinity.
titleStmt.author: Ward, Samuel, 1577-1640.
Wood, Ambrose.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H[umphrey] L[ownes] for Samuell Macham; and are to be sould at his shop in Pauls-church-yard, at the signe of the Buls-head,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Pauls-church-yard, at the signe of the Buls-head
